brainly_data.question:
What is one of the similarities between Dr. King's "I Have a Dream" speech and Mahatma Gandhi's "Quit India"? 

A. Both preach resolutions to their problems through non-violent actions.
B. Both call the people to rise up if they don't get what they're asking for.
C. Both want freedom from Britain.
D. Both men demand the opportunity to speak.
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question:
What is one of the similarities between Dr. King's "I Have a Dream" speech and Mahatma Gandhi's "Quit India"? 

A. Both preach resolutions to their problems through non-violent actions.
B. Both call the people to rise up if they don't get what they're asking for.
C. Both want freedom from Britain.
D. Both men demand the opportunity to speak.
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: A. It was a non violent speech

B. Both call the people to rise up if they don't get what they're asking for.

all_answers.text: In one sense it can be all of them
